title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Long Sleeve Fleece Logo Crewneck Sweatshirt
features: Fly your flag, the Tommy way. Tommy Hilfiger’s seriously soft fleece sweatshirts for men keep you covered in classic Tommy style. Ultra-comfortable and endlessly layerable, they’re your wardrobe go-to for hitting the gym or just kicking back.
FAMOUS FLEECE: 100% pure cotton yarn gives Tommy Hilfiger’s mens crewneck sweatshirts their soft feel, lofty weight and natural breathability.
LAYER UP: A great outer layer on mild days, Tommy Hilfiger’s logo sweatshirt for men is also perfect under parkas when the temperatures plummet.
AS CLASSIC AS IT GETS: From the ribbed collar and hem to the logo motif—a signature of Tommy Hilfiger’s graphic sweatshirts—the details make all the difference.
A CLOSET ESSENTIAL: Discover the quintessential men’s sweatshirts, perfected by the team at Tommy Hilfiger—purveyors of classic, American cool style since 1985.
description: Tommy Hilfiger sweatshirt for men in a classic Tommy design. Sweatshirt for men with a crewneck collar. Men's sweatshirt with a ribbed collar and waistband. Tommy sweatshirt with embroidered flag on sleeve. Tommy Hilfiger sweatshirt for men will be the perfect layer for chilly days or easy lounging.
